name: Summoners Arena
tagline: Summoners, pick up your spell book and buckle up for this one last war!
description:
Summoners Arena is an impeccable integration between GameFi and NFT which provides countless opportunities for players to take part in immersive gameplay whilst earning a sustainable income. 

Utilising the timeless classic idle-RPG combined with the P2E model, Summoners Arena delivers a wide variety of exciting game modes, a huge number of heroes and most importantly, mesmerising visual effects to truly engage with players. 

Fostered by a passionate and boundlessly talented team of developers, Summoners Arena aims to deliver an enchanting community-driven gaming experience that is beneficial to and governed by players and investors themselves.
